title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Doug Gottlieb filling in for Colin

The Cowboys loss to the Raiders and the aftermath

Matt Nagy's comments after the Bears win over the Lions


Guest: Brandon Weedon
